title: Molybdenum trioxide as a newer diversified economic catalyst for the transformation of nitroarenes to arylamine and 5-substituted-1H-tetrazole
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29505-29517
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05443A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anand Maurya, Upendra Kumar Patel, Sanjeev Kumar, Alka Agarwal
The present work has developed a straightforward, gentle, and effective approach for synthesizing arylamines and 5-substituted-1H-tetrazole derivatives, and among the two tested catalysts, molybdenum trioxide (MoO3) proved to be highly effective.
